title: The Latest: San Diego school official sees Muslim bullying
title_page: The Latest: San Diego school official sees Muslim bullying | Daily Mail Online
text:
SAN DIEGO (AP) - The Latest on a campaign against Islamophobia in San Diego public schools (all times local):
7:30 p.m.
A board member of San Diego public schools says bullying of Muslim students across the country is pervasive and underreported.
Kevin Beiser says the San Diego Unified School District's effort to fight Islamophobia and promote understanding of Muslim culture is modeled on an earlier campaign he advanced to protect LGBT students.
The plan has drawn criticism in conservative media sites and on the internet but calls to protest at a school board meeting on Tuesday fizzled. No one in the audience spoke against the plan and there were no visible signs of opposition.
